casebody.data:
BOLIER & COMPANY, LLC and Christian G. Plasman
v.
DECCA FURNITURE (USA), INC., Decca Contract Furniture, LLC, Richard Herbst, Wai Theng Tin, Tsang C. Hung, Decca Furniture, Ltd., Decca Hospitality Furnishings, LLC, Dongguan Decca Furniture Co. Ltd., Darren Hudgins and Decca Home
v.
Christian J. Plasman a/k/a Barrett Plasman, Third-Party Defendant No. 461P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Matthew K. Rogers, Attorney at Law, Hickory, David S. Pokela, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Plasman, Christian G., et al. Robert A. Muckenfuss, Attorney at Law, Jodie H. Lawson, Attorney at Law, Andrew D. Atkins, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Decca Furniture (USA), Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of December 2016 by Plaintiff (Christian G. Plasman) and Third-Party Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
